roleset.name: apparent, clear
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Comparison to 'clear-j.01'.

example.name: args 1,2
example.text: The meaning behind the Lei Feng Spirit changes a lot within the system , whereas among the common folk , the meaning of the Lei Feng Spirit has always been relatively plain and clear , equivalent to " " helping others out " and " doing good . "
example.arg: the meaning of the Lei Feng Spirit
equivalent to " "helping others out " and "doing good"

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is plain
